name: "SEAPODS", Open Edition Giclee Print
description:
Open Edition Museum Quality Paper Giclee Print

"SEAPODS" by R.S. Connett

CLICK THE IMAGE LEFT TO SEE LARGER DETAILED EXAMPLES

More pictures of this painting can be seen CLICK HERE

Image Size is 20" W x 20" H, (51 cm. W x 51 cm. H) This will be printed upon a 24" x 20" sheet of heavy Bright White archival paper.

My Heavy Paper Giclee prints are printed on 100% acid-free, 255 gsm paper, 18ML, .02 inch thickness. It's thick and feels solid to the touch. Thicker paper means I can lay down more ink, and more ink means a deeper, richer print. The inks I use will not fade for 100 years according to the manufacturer. The finish is Semi-Gloss, (aka: "SATIN"). Signed and Titled by the Artist on the white outer surface of the print (Not on the image)

Each print is individually created with TLC!

Shipping is FREE in the USA ~ NO tax ~ See Cart for costs to other destinations.

Shipping Time: These are usually shipped within 2 to 4 working days..

PAPER PRINTS ARE SHIPPED ROLLED. I guarantee that your art will reach you in perfect condition. I will replace any print damaged or lost in shipping free of charge. Satisfaction guaranteed our your money will be refunded. Framing is suggested for best results.
